questions.prompt: Which letter makes the /b/ sound as in 'ball'?
hints: This letter makes a sound with your lips pressed together.

feedback.correct: Great job! The letter 'b' makes the /b/ sound.
feedback.incorrect: The letter 'b' makes the /b/ sound. Listen again and try once more.

questions.prompt: Which word rhymes with 'bat'?
hints: Listen for words that end with the same sound.

feedback.correct: Excellent! 'Bat' and 'cat' rhyme because they both end with 'at'.
feedback.incorrect: 'Bat' and 'cat' rhyme because they both end with 'at'.

questions.prompt: Listen to these sounds: /b/ /a/ /t/. What word do they make?
hints: Say each sound slowly, then try to say them faster together.

feedback.correct: Perfect! When you blend /b/ /a/ /t/, you get 'bat'.
feedback.incorrect: When you blend /b/ /a/ /t/, you get 'bat'. Try again by saying the sounds faster together.
